name: file
title: File
description: A file document in the database. The corresponding file is in S3.

filename.description: The name of the file. It can include slashes for the path in S3.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

type.description: The MIME type of the file.

linkedDocuments.description: The documents that are linked to this file.

id.description: The ID of the linked document.

collection.description: The collection of the linked document.

maxSize.description: The maximum size of the file in bytes.

expiresAt.description: The date at which the file expires.
